entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Maniwaki Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 63 %
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending in the morning then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the morning then steady. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
